alert.note: Alert for Clay; Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:58AM EDT until June 29 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Vigo County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Clay County in west central Indiana... South central Parke County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 645 AM EDT. * At 558 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vermilion, or 8 miles northwest of Terre Haute, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... West Terre Haute around 605 AM EDT. North Terre Haute, Indiana State University and Shepardsville around 610 AM EDT. Terre Haute around 615 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Seelyville, Rosedale, Fontanet, Staunton, Brazil, Carbon, Knightsville, Harmony and Center Point. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 1 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
